column4: what should I be reading about to get audio from my microphone-in?   It was working until 10.04, I upgraded to 10.10 and it's still not working...would it be useful to go to natty?
I had that same thing happer, I just use a headset when I Skype now, but I'd be interested to know if you find a fix.
i think my problems may actually in part be due to skype, so I think you're right in that they are related
my external mic works just fine, it's just the internal that b0rked with the upgrade.
